title: Can we accept Birthday Gifts? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: Romar says my sister and brother-in-law gifted me money as a birthday gift I do not celebrate birthdays and have advised my family in relation to this on several occasions what should I do with the money gifted if I try to return it they will not accept no don't return it a key what is prohibited is to celebrate your birthday what is prohibited is to be with them in a gathering or a cake or blowing of candles what is prohibited is for you to exchange birthday greetings but to accept the gift there is no problem in that none whatsoever
